title: Polish apple meringue cake
ingredients: ['For the base', '375g plain flour, sifted', '220g unsalted butter', '4 egg yolks', '3 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder', 'For the filling', '1.5kg apples - cored, peeled and grated', '100g caster sugar', 'For the meringue', '4 egg whites', '100g caster sugar']
